entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Assiniboia Airport 12:00 PM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -1.2°C
Wind: WNW 39 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 near noon. High minus 1 with temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Thursday 26 January 2023
